name: Gaia of the Souten Fists
text:
2 "Souten" monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls; destroy it, also this card cannot attack directly for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Gaia of the Souten Fists" once per turn. While you control a "Souten" Fusion Monster that was Fusion Summoned using an Effect Monster(s) as material, all "Souten" Fusion Monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF.
